'''Encompassing Gladness''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Braised Meatball]] with [[Xianyun]]. The recipe for Braised Meatballs can be purchased from [[Licai]] for {{Item|Mora|x=5,000}}.

Encompassing Gladness increases the ATK of all party members by '''274''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
